ingredients.item: 380g pack 4 frozen essential Waitrose British Chicken Breast Steaks
1 tbsp essential Waitrose White Wine Vinegar

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200˚C, gas mark 6. Place the chicken on a baking tray and bake for 25–28 minutes. Check the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat, then cut into thin slices.
Meanwhile, mix together the watercress, tomatoes and sweetcorn in a serving bowl.
Whisk the oil, vinegar and mustard together, season and toss into the salad with the chicken.
